Council on Environmental QualityThe administration is committed to ensuring that we are good stewards of our environment, while supporting American prosperity.
						President Donald J. Trump					MODERNIZING ENVIRONMENTAL REVIEWS: President Donald J. Trump is modernizing environmental regulations to deliver infrastructure projects that will improve our communities.
